00052         public static byte[] GetFreeBusyData(StringDictionary People, DateTime StartTime, DateTime EndTime, int Interval,
00053             string UserName, string Password,string Server,string TimeZoneDifference)
00054         {
00055             try
00056             {
00057                 if (People.Count < 1)
00058                     return null;
00059                 if (StartTime >= EndTime)
00060                     return null;
00061                 string EmailAddresses = "";
00062                 foreach (string Person in People.Values)
00063                 {
00064                     EmailAddresses += "&u=SMTP:" + Person;
00065                 }
00066                 string Url = Server + "/public/?cmd=freebusy&start=" + StartTime.ToString("yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss") + TimeZoneDifference + "&end=" + EndTime.ToString("yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss") + TimeZoneDifference + "&interval=" + Interval.ToString() + EmailAddresses;
00067 
00068                 System.Net.CredentialCache MyCredentialCache = new System.Net.CredentialCache();
00069                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00070                 {
00071                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(Url),
00072                                         "NTLM",
00073                                         new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName, Password, "")
00074                                         );
00075                 }
00076                 else
00077                 {
00078                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(Url),
00079                                            "Negotiate",
00080                                            (System.Net.NetworkCredential)CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials);
00081                 }
00082 
00083                 System.Net.HttpWebRequest Request = (System.Net.HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(Url);
00084                 Request.Credentials = MyCredentialCache;
00085                 Request.Method = "GET";
00086                 Request.ContentType = "text/xml; encoding='utf-8'";
00087                 Request.UserAgent = "Mozilla/4.0(compatible;MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; SV1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; InfoPath.1)";
00088                 Request.KeepAlive = true;
00089                 Request.AllowAutoRedirect = false;
00090 
00091                 System.Net.WebResponse Response = (HttpWebResponse)Request.GetResponse();
00092                 byte[] bytes = null;
00093                 using (System.IO.Stream ResponseStream = Response.GetResponseStream())
00094                 {
00095                     XmlDocument ResponseXmlDoc = new XmlDocument();
00096                     ResponseXmlDoc.Load(ResponseStream);
00097                     XmlNodeList DisplayNameNodes = ResponseXmlDoc.GetElementsByTagName("a:item");
00098                     if (DisplayNameNodes.Count > 0)
00099                     {
00100                         for (int i = 0; i < DisplayNameNodes.Count; i++)
00101                         {
00102                             XmlNodeList Nodes = DisplayNameNodes[i].ChildNodes;
00103                             foreach (XmlNode Node in Nodes)
00104                             {
00105                                 if (Node.Name == "a:fbdata")
00106                                 {
00107                                     bytes = new byte[Node.InnerText.Length];
00108                                     for (int x = 0; x < Node.InnerText.Length; ++x)
00109                                     {
00110                                         bytes[x] = byte.Parse(Node.InnerText[x].ToString());
00111                                     }
00112                                 }
00113                             }
00114                         }
00115                     }
00116                     else
00117                     {
00118                         throw new Exception("Could not get free/busy data from the exchange server");
00119                     }
00120                     // Clean up.
00121                     ResponseStream.Close();
00122                     Response.Close();
00123                 }
00124                 return bytes;
00125 
00126             }
00127             catch { throw; }
00128         }

00142         public static bool ArePeopleFree(StringDictionary People, DateTime StartTime, DateTime EndTime, int Interval,
00143             string UserName, string Password, string Server, string TimeZoneDifference)
00144         {
00145             try
00146             {
00147                 byte[] FreeBusy = GetFreeBusyData(People, StartTime, EndTime, Interval, UserName, Password, Server, TimeZoneDifference);
00148                 if (FreeBusy == null)
00149                     return false;
00150 
00151                 for (int x = 0; x < FreeBusy.Length; ++x)
00152                 {
00153                     if (FreeBusy[x] > 0)
00154                         return false;
00155                 }
00156                 return true;
00157             }
00158             catch { throw; }
00159         }

00169         public static bool HasPermissionToCalendar(string UserName, string Password, string Directory,string Server)
00170         {
00171             try
00172             {
00173                 System.Net.HttpWebRequest Request = (System.Net.HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(Server + "exchange/" + Directory + "/Calendar/");
00174 
00175                 System.Net.CredentialCache MyCredentialCache = new System.Net.CredentialCache();
00176                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00177                 {
00178                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(Server + "exchange/" + Directory + "/Calendar/"),
00179                                        "NTLM",
00180                                        new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName, Password));
00181                 }
00182                 else
00183                 {
00184                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(Server + "exchange/" + Directory + "/Calendar/"),
00185                                            "Negotiate",
00186                                            (System.Net.NetworkCredential)CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials);
00187                 }
00188 
00189                 Request.Credentials = MyCredentialCache;
00190 
00191                 Request.Method = "GET";
00192                 Request.ContentType = "text/xml; encoding='utf-8'";
00193                 Request.UserAgent = "Mozilla/4.0(compatible;MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; SV1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; InfoPath.1)";
00194                 Request.KeepAlive = true;
00195                 Request.AllowAutoRedirect = false;
00196 
00197                 System.Net.WebResponse Response = (HttpWebResponse)Request.GetResponse();
00198                 Response.Close();
00199                 return true;
00200             }
00201             catch { throw; }
00202         }

00212         public static List<VCard> GetContacts(string UserName, string Password, string Directory,string Server)
00213         {
00214             try
00215             {
00216                 List<VCard> ReturnArray = new List<VCard>();
00217                 string Uri = string.Format("http://{0}/exchange/{1}/contacts/", Server, Directory);
00218 
00219                 byte[] Contents = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(string.Format(
00220                    @"<?xml version=""1.0""?>
00221                     <g:searchrequest xmlns:g=""DAV:"">
00222                         <g:sql>
00223                             SELECT
00224                                 ""urn:schemas:contacts:givenName"", ""urn:schemas:contacts:sn"",
00225                                 ""urn:schemas:contacts:email1"",""urn:schemas:contacts:businesshomepage"",
00226                                 ""urn:schemas:contacts:title"",""urn:schemas:contacts:telephoneNumber"",
00227                                 ""urn:schemas:contacts:o""
00228                             FROM
00229                                 Scope('SHALLOW TRAVERSAL OF ""http://{0}/exchange/{1}/contacts/""')
00230                         </g:sql>
00231                     </g:searchrequest>",
00232                     Server, Directory));
00233 
00234 
00235 
00236                 HttpWebRequest Request = HttpWebRequest.Create(Uri) as HttpWebRequest;
00237                 System.Net.CredentialCache MyCredentialCache = new System.Net.CredentialCache();
00238                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00239                 {
00240                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(Uri),
00241                                        "NTLM",
00242                                        new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName, Password));
00243                 }
00244                 else
00245                 {
00246                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(Uri),
00247                                            "Negotiate",
00248                                            (System.Net.NetworkCredential)CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials);
00249                 }
00250                 Request.Credentials = MyCredentialCache;
00251                 Request.Method = "SEARCH";
00252                 Request.ContentLength = Contents.Length;
00253                 Request.ContentType = "text/xml";
00254 
00255                 using (System.IO.Stream RequestStream = Request.GetRequestStream())
00256                 {
00257                     RequestStream.Write(Contents, 0, Contents.Length);
00258                     using (HttpWebResponse Response = Request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse)
00259                     {
00260                         using (System.IO.Stream ResponseStream = Response.GetResponseStream())
00261                         {
00262                             XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00263                             Document.Load(ResponseStream);
00264                             foreach (XmlElement PropStat in Document.GetElementsByTagName("a:propstat"))
00265                             {
00266                                 if (PropStat.GetElementsByTagName("a:status")[0].InnerText.Contains("200 OK"))
00267                                 {
00268                                     foreach (XmlElement Element in PropStat.GetElementsByTagName("a:prop"))
00269                                     {
00270                                         VCard TempCard = new VCard();
00271                                         if (Element["d:sn"] != null)
00272                                         {
00273                                             TempCard.LastName = Element["d:sn"].InnerText;
00274                                         }
00275                                         if (Element["d:givenName"] != null)
00276                                         {
00277                                             TempCard.FirstName = Element["d:givenName"].InnerText;
00278                                         }
00279                                         if (Element["d:email1"] != null)
00280                                         {
00281                                             TempCard.Email = Element["d:email1"].InnerText.Replace("\"", "");
00282                                         }
00283                                         if (Element["d:businesshomepage"] != null)
00284                                         {
00285                                             TempCard.Url = Element["d:businesshomepage"].InnerText;
00286                                         }
00287                                         if (Element["d:title"] != null)
00288                                         {
00289                                             TempCard.Title = Element["d:title"].InnerText;
00290                                         }
00291                                         if (Element["d:telephoneNumber"] != null)
00292                                         {
00293                                             TempCard.DirectDial = Element["d:telephoneNumber"].InnerText;
00294                                         }
00295                                         if (Element["d:o"] != null)
00296                                         {
00297                                             TempCard.Organization = Element["d:o"].InnerText;
00298                                         }
00299                                         ReturnArray.Add(TempCard);
00300                                     }
00301                                 }
00302                             }
00303                         }
00304                     }
00305                 }
00306                 return ReturnArray;
00307             }
00308             catch { throw; }
00309         }

00319         public static List<Utilities.Web.Email.Message> GetEmail(string UserName, string Password, string Directory, string Server)
00320         {
00321             try
00322             {
00323                 List<Utilities.Web.Email.Message> ReturnArray = new List<Utilities.Web.Email.Message>();
00324                 string Uri = string.Format("http://{0}/exchange/{1}/inbox", Server, Directory);
00325 
00326                 byte[] Contents = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(string.Format(
00327                    @"<?xml version=""1.0""?>
00328                     <g:searchrequest xmlns:g=""DAV:"">
00329                         <g:sql>
00330                             SELECT
00331                                 ""urn:schemas:httpmail:subject"", ""urn:schemas:httpmail:to"",
00332                                 ""urn:schemas:httpmail:from"",""urn:schemas:httpmail:htmldescription""
00333                             FROM
00334                                 Scope('DEEP TRAVERSAL OF ""http://{0}/exchange/{1}/inbox""')
00335                             WHERE
00336                                 ""DAV:contentclass"" = 'urn:content-classes:message'
00337                         </g:sql>
00338                     </g:searchrequest>",
00339                     Server, Directory));
00340 
00341 
00342 
00343                 HttpWebRequest Request = HttpWebRequest.Create(Uri) as HttpWebRequest;
00344                 System.Net.CredentialCache MyCredentialCache = new System.Net.CredentialCache();
00345                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00346                 {
00347                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(Uri),
00348                                        "NTLM",
00349                                        new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName, Password));
00350                 }
00351                 else
00352                 {
00353                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(Uri),
00354                                            "Negotiate",
00355                                            (System.Net.NetworkCredential)CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials);
00356                 }
00357                 Request.Credentials = MyCredentialCache;
00358                 Request.Method = "SEARCH";
00359                 Request.ContentLength = Contents.Length;
00360                 Request.ContentType = "text/xml";
00361 
00362                 using (System.IO.Stream RequestStream = Request.GetRequestStream())
00363                 {
00364                     RequestStream.Write(Contents, 0, Contents.Length);
00365 
00366                     using (HttpWebResponse Response = Request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse)
00367                     {
00368                         using (System.IO.Stream ResponseStream = Response.GetResponseStream())
00369                         {
00370                             XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00371                             Document.Load(ResponseStream);
00372                             foreach (XmlElement Element in Document.GetElementsByTagName("a:prop"))
00373                             {
00374                                 Utilities.Web.Email.Message TempMessage = new Utilities.Web.Email.Message();
00375                                 if (Element["d:subject"] != null)
00376                                 {
00377                                     TempMessage.Subject = Element["d:subject"].InnerText;
00378                                 }
00379                                 if (Element["d:htmldescription"] != null)
00380                                 {
00381                                     TempMessage.Body = Element["d:htmldescription"].InnerText;
00382                                 }
00383                                 if (Element["d:to"] != null)
00384                                 {
00385                                     TempMessage.To = Element["d:to"].InnerText;
00386                                 }
00387                                 if (Element["d:from"] != null)
00388                                 {
00389                                     TempMessage.From = Element["d:from"].InnerText;
00390                                 }
00391                                 ReturnArray.Add(TempMessage);
00392                             }
00393                         }
00394                     }
00395                 }
00396                 return ReturnArray;
00397             }
00398             catch { throw; }
00399         }

00411         public static List<VCalendar> GetCalendarItems(string UserName, string Password, string Server,string Directory,DateTime StartDate,DateTime EndDate)
00412         {
00413             try
00414             {
00415                 List<VCalendar> ReturnArray = new List<VCalendar>();
00416                 string Uri = string.Format("http://{0}/exchange/{1}/calendar/", Server, Directory);
00417 
00418                 string Query = "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>"
00419                      + "<g:searchrequest xmlns:g=\"DAV:\">"
00420                      + "<g:sql>SELECT \"urn:schemas:calendar:location\", \"urn:schemas:httpmail:subject\", "
00421                      + "\"urn:schemas:httpmail:textdescription\", "
00422                      + "\"urn:schemas:calendar:dtstart\", \"urn:schemas:calendar:dtend\", "
00423                      + "\"urn:schemas:calendar:busystatus\", \"urn:schemas:calendar:instancetype\" "
00424                      + "FROM Scope('SHALLOW TRAVERSAL OF \"" + Uri + "\"') "
00425                      + "WHERE ((\"urn:schemas:calendar:dtstart\" &gt;= '" + StartDate.ToString("yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss") + "' "
00426                      + "AND \"urn:schemas:calendar:dtstart\" &lt;= '" + EndDate.ToString("yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss") + "') "
00427                      + "OR (\"urn:schemas:calendar:dtend\" &gt;= '" + StartDate.ToString("yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss") + "' "
00428                      + "AND \"urn:schemas:calendar:dtstart\" &lt;= '" + EndDate.ToString("yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss") + "')) "
00429                      + "AND \"DAV:contentclass\" = 'urn:content-classes:appointment' "
00430                      + "AND NOT \"urn:schemas:calendar:instancetype\" = 1 "
00431                      + "ORDER BY \"urn:schemas:calendar:dtstart\" ASC"
00432                      + "</g:sql></g:searchrequest>";
00433                 byte[] Contents = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(Query);
00434 
00435                 HttpWebRequest Request = HttpWebRequest.Create(Uri) as HttpWebRequest;
00436                 System.Net.CredentialCache MyCredentialCache = new System.Net.CredentialCache();
00437                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(UserName) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(Password))
00438                 {
00439                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(Uri),
00440                                        "NTLM",
00441                                        new System.Net.NetworkCredential(UserName, Password));
00442                 }
00443                 else
00444                 {
00445                     MyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(Uri),
00446                                            "Negotiate",
00447                                            (System.Net.NetworkCredential)CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials);
00448                 }
00449                 Request.Credentials = MyCredentialCache;
00450                 Request.Method = "SEARCH";
00451                 Request.ContentLength = Contents.Length;
00452                 Request.ContentType = "text/xml";
00453 
00454                 using (System.IO.Stream RequestStream = Request.GetRequestStream())
00455                 {
00456                     RequestStream.Write(Contents, 0, Contents.Length);
00457 
00458                     using (HttpWebResponse Response = Request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse)
00459                     {
00460                         using (System.IO.Stream ResponseStream = Response.GetResponseStream())
00461                         {
00462                             XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00463                             Document.Load(ResponseStream);
00464                             foreach (XmlElement Element in Document.GetElementsByTagName("a:prop"))
00465                             {
00466                                 VCalendar Cal = new VCalendar();
00467                                 if (Element["e:textdescription"] != null)
00468                                 {
00469                                     Cal.Description = Element["e:textdescription"].InnerText;
00470                                 }
00471                                 if (Element["e:subject"] != null)
00472                                 {
00473                                     Cal.Subject = Element["e:subject"].InnerText;
00474                                 }
00475                                 if (Element["d:location"] != null)
00476                                 {
00477                                     Cal.Location = Element["d:location"].InnerText;
00478                                 }
00479                                 if (Element["d:dtstart"] != null)
00480                                 {
00481                                     Cal.StartTime = DateTime.Parse(Element["d:dtstart"].InnerText);
00482                                 }
00483                                 if (Element["d:dtend"] != null)
00484                                 {
00485                                     Cal.EndTime = DateTime.Parse(Element["d:dtend"].InnerText);
00486                                 }
00487                                 ReturnArray.Add(Cal);
00488                             }
00489                         }
00490                     }
00491                 }
00492                 return ReturnArray;
00493             }
00494             catch { throw; }
00495         }

00505         public static StringDictionary GetGAL(string UserName, string Password,string Server)
00506         {
00507             try
00508             {
00509                 StringDictionary ReturnArray = new StringDictionary();
00510                 List<LDAP.Entry> Entries = null;
00511                 using (LDAP.Directory TempDirectory = new Utilities.LDAP.Directory("", UserName, Password, Server))
00512                 {
00513                     Entries = TempDirectory.FindActiveUsersAndGroups("mail=*");
00514                     TempDirectory.Close();
00515                 }
00516                 foreach (LDAP.Entry Entry in Entries)
00517                 {
00518                     ReturnArray.Add(Entry.Name, Entry.Email);
00519                 }
00520                 return ReturnArray;
00521             }
00522             catch { throw; }
00523         }

00536         public static DateTime PickNextAvailableTime(StringDictionary People, DateTime StartTime, DateTime EndTime, string UserName, string Password,string Server,string TimeZoneDifference)
00537         {
00538             try
00539             {
00540                 StartTime = StartTime.AddMinutes(15.0d);
00541                 EndTime = EndTime.AddMinutes(15.0d);
00542                 DateTime FinalEndTime = StartTime.AddMonths(3);
00543                 DateTime TrueStartTime = StartTime;
00544                 byte[] Data = GetFreeBusyData(People, StartTime, FinalEndTime, 15, UserName, Password, Server, TimeZoneDifference);
00545                 if (Data.Length == 0)
00546                     return new DateTime(1900, 1, 1);
00547                 int FinalCount = 0;
00548                 while (StartTime < EndTime)
00549                 {
00550                     StartTime = StartTime.AddMinutes(15.0d);
00551                     ++FinalCount;
00552                 }
00553                 StartTime = TrueStartTime;
00554                 int Counter = 0;
00555                 DateTime CurrentTime = StartTime;
00556                 DateTime CurrentStartTime = StartTime;
00557                 for (int y = 0; y < Data.Length; ++y)
00558                 {
00559                     CurrentTime = CurrentTime.AddMinutes(15.0d);
00560                     if (Data[y] != 0)
00561                     {
00562                         Counter = 0;
00563                         CurrentStartTime = CurrentTime;
00564                     }
00565                     else if (CurrentTime.Hour < 8 || CurrentTime.Hour >= 19 || CurrentTime.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday || CurrentTime.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday)
00566                     {
00567                         Counter = 0;
00568                         CurrentStartTime = CurrentTime;
00569                     }
00570                     else
00571                     {
00572                         ++Counter;
00573                         if (Counter >= FinalCount)
00574                             return CurrentStartTime;
00575                     }
00576                 }
00577                 return new DateTime(1900, 1, 1);
00578             }
00579             catch { throw; }
00580         }
00581 
00593         public static DateTime PickPreviousAvailableTime(StringDictionary People, DateTime StartTime, DateTime EndTime, string UserName, string Password,string Server, string TimeZoneDifference)
00594         {
00595             try
00596             {
00597                 StartTime = StartTime.AddMinutes(-15.0d);
00598                 EndTime = EndTime.AddMinutes(-15.0d);
00599                 DateTime FinalEndTime = EndTime;
00600                 DateTime FinalStartTime = StartTime.AddMonths(-3);
00601                 DateTime TrueStartTime = StartTime;
00602                 byte[] Data = GetFreeBusyData(People, FinalStartTime, FinalEndTime, 15, UserName, Password, Server, TimeZoneDifference);
00603                 if (Data.Length == 0)
00604                     return new DateTime(1900, 1, 1);
00605                 int FinalCount = 0;
00606                 while (StartTime < EndTime)
00607                 {
00608                     StartTime = StartTime.AddMinutes(15.0d);
00609                     ++FinalCount;
00610                 }
00611                 StartTime = TrueStartTime;
00612                 int Counter = 0;
00613                 DateTime CurrentTime = EndTime;
00614                 DateTime CurrentEndTime = EndTime;
00615                 for (int y = Data.Length - 1; y >= 0; --y)
00616                 {
00617                     CurrentTime = CurrentTime.AddMinutes(-15.0d);
00618                     if (Data[y] != 0)
00619                     {
00620                         Counter = 0;
00621                         CurrentEndTime = CurrentTime;
00622                     }
00623                     else if (CurrentTime.Hour < 8 || CurrentTime.Hour >= 19 || CurrentTime.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday || CurrentTime.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday)
00624                     {
00625                         Counter = 0;
00626                         CurrentEndTime = CurrentTime;
00627                     }
00628                     else
00629                     {
00630                         ++Counter;
00631                         if (Counter >= FinalCount)
00632                         {
00633                             for (int x = 0; x < FinalCount; ++x)
00634                             {
00635                                 CurrentEndTime = CurrentEndTime.AddMinutes(-15.0d);
00636                             }
00637                             return CurrentEndTime;
00638                         }
00639                     }
00640                 }
00641                 return new DateTime(1900, 1, 1);
00642             }
00643             catch { throw; }
00644         }
00645         #endregion
00646     }
